verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תֵצֵ֨א <WH3318> When thou goest out לַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> to battle עַל־ <WH5921> against אֹיְבֶ֗יךָ <WH341> against thine enemies וְֽרָאִ֜יתָ <WH7200> and seest ס֤וּס <WH5483> horses וָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> and chariots עַ֚ם <WH5971> [and] a people רַ֣ב <WH7227> more מִמְּךָ֔ <WH4480> than לֹ֥א <WH3808> do תִירָ֖א <WH3372> than thou be not afraid מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of them for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with הַמַּֽעַלְךָ֖ <WH5927> [is] with thee which brought thee up מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> become כְּקָֽרָבְכֶ֖ם <WH7126> And it shall be when ye are come nigh אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> unto the battle וְנִגַּ֥שׁ <WH5066> shall approach הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> that the priest וְדִבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> and speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> unto the people

וְאָמַ֤ר <WH559> And shall say אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> unto them Hear יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel אַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> ye קְרֵבִ֥ים <WH7131> ye approach הַיּ֛וֹם <WH3117> this day לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> unto battle עַל־ <WH5921> against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֑ם <WH341> against your enemies אַל־ <WH408> nay יֵרַ֣ךְ <WH7401> faint לְבַבְכֶ֗ם <WH3824> let not your hearts אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֧וּ <WH3372> fear וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּחְפְּז֛וּ <WH2648> not and do not tremble וְאַל־ <WH408> not תַּֽעַרְצ֖וּ <WH6206> neither be ye terrified מִפְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> because

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> [is] he that goeth עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> against לְהִלָּחֵ֥ם <WH3898> with you to fight לָכֶ֛ם עִם־ <WH5973> against אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <WH341> for you against your enemies לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> to save אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְדִבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> shall speak הַשֹּֽׁטְרִים֮ <WH7860> And the officers אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto the people לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> What man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that בָּנָ֤ה <WH1129> [is there] that hath built בַֽיִת־ <WH1004> house חָדָשׁ֙ <WH2319> a new וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not חֲנָכ֔וֹ <WH2596> and hath not dedicated יֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> to his house פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> and another יַחְנְכֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2596> dedicate

וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> And what man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that נָטַ֥ע <WH5193> [is he] that hath planted כֶּ֙רֶם֙ <WH3754> a vineyard וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not חִלְּל֔וֹ <WH2490> and hath not [yet] eaten יֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> unto his house פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> and another יְחַלְּלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH2490> eat

וּמִֽי־ <WH4310> and who הָאִ֞ישׁ <WH376> And what man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is אֵרַ֤שׂ <WH781> [is there] that hath betrothed אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> a wife וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not לְקָחָ֔הּ <WH3947> and hath not taken יֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> depart וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> unto his house פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise יָמוּת֙ <WH4191> lest he die בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> in the battle וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אַחֵ֖ר <WH312> and another יִקָּחֶֽנָּה׃ <WH3947> take

וְיָסְפ֣וּ <WH3254> further הַשֹּׁטְרִים֮ <WH7860> And the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> shall speak אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֒ <WH5971> unto the people וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> and they shall say מִי־ <WH4310> Who הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> What man הַיָּרֵא֙ <WH3373> [is there that is] fearful וְרַ֣ךְ <WH7390> faint הַלֵּבָ֔ב <WH3824> heart יֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> along וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> and return לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> unto his house וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִמַּ֛ס <WH4549> faint אֶת־ <WH853> לְבַ֥ב <WH3824> as well as his heart אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> lest his brethren's כִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <WH3824> hearts

וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become כְּכַלֹּ֥ת <WH3615> have made an end הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <WH7860> And it shall be when the officers לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> of speaking אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto the people וּפָ֥קְד֛וּ <WH6485> that they shall make שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> captains צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of the armies בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> to lead הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תִקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> When thou comest nigh אֶל־ <WH413> about עִ֔יר <WH5892> unto a city לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against וְקָרָ֥אתָ <WH7121> against it then proclaim אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> of לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> peace

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall become אִם־ <WH518> If שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> of peace תַּֽעַנְךָ֔ <WH6030> And it shall be if it make thee answer וּפָתְחָ֖ה <WH6605> and open לָ֑ךְ וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> shall become כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> unto thee then it shall be [that] all the people הַנִּמְצָא־ <WH4672> [that is] found בָ֗הּ יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> shall become לְךָ֛ לָמַ֖ס <WH4522> therein shall be tributaries וַעֲבָדֽוּךָ׃ <WH5647> unto thee and they shall serve

וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֤א <WH3808> does not תַשְׁלִים֙ <WH7999> And if it will make no peace עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> against וְעָשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6213> with thee but will make עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> against מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> war וְצַרְתָּ֖ <WH6696> against thee then thou shalt besiege עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וּנְתָנָ֛הּ <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> it into thine hands וְהִכִּיתָ֥ <WH5221> thou shalt smite אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all זְכוּרָ֖הּ <WH2138> every male לְפִי־ <WH6310> thereof with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

רַ֣ק <WH7535> but הַ֠נָּשִׁים <WH802> But the women וְהַטַּ֨ף <WH2945> and the little ones וְהַבְּהֵמָ֜ה <WH929> and the cattle וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> is in בָעִ֛יר <WH5892> and all that is in the city כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁלָלָ֖הּ <WH7998> [even] all the spoil תָּבֹ֣ז <WH962> thereof shalt thou take לָ֑ךְ וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <WH398> unto thyself and thou shalt eat אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלַ֣ל <WH7998> the spoil אֹיְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> of thine enemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לָֽךְ׃

כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> Thus תַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> Thus shalt thou do לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> unto all the cities הָרְחֹקֹ֥ת <WH7350> far off מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> that מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [which are] very אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> are not מֵעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> [are] not of the cities הַגּֽוֹיִם־ <WH1471> of these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> of these הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2007> from thee which

רַ֗ק <WH7535> in מֵעָרֵ֤י <WH5892> But of the cities הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> of these people הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> doth give לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְחַיֶּ֖ה <WH2421> thou shalt save alive כָּל־ <WH3605> anything נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <WH5397> nothing that breatheth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הַחֲרֵ֣ם <WH2763> But thou shalt utterly תַּחֲרִימֵ֗ם <WH2763> destroy הַחִתִּ֤י <WH2850> them [namely] the Hittites וְהָאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> and the Amorites הַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <WH3669> the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and the Perizzites הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <WH2983> and the Jebusites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

לְמַ֗עַן <WH4616> so אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> may not יְלַמְּד֤וּ <WH3925> That they teach אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> you not to do כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all תּֽוֹעֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH8441> after all their abominations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> which they have done לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> unto their gods וַחֲטָאתֶ֖ם <WH2398> so should ye sin לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תָצ֣וּר <WH6696> When thou shalt besiege אֶל־ <WH413> about עִיר֩ <WH5892> a city יָמִ֨ים <WH3117> time רַבִּ֜ים <WH7227> a long לְֽהִלָּחֵ֧ם <WH3898> in making war עָלֶ֣יהָ <WH5921> against לְתָפְשָׂ֗הּ <WH8610> against it to take לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַשְׁחִ֤ית <WH7843> it thou shalt not destroy אֶת־ <WH853> עֵצָהּ֙ <WH6086> the trees לִנְדֹּ֤חַ <WH5080> thereof by forcing עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> against גַּרְזֶ֔ן <WH1631> an axe כִּ֚י <WH3588> When מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> at תֹאכֵ֔ל <WH398> against them for thou mayest eat וְאֹת֖וֹ <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִכְרֹ֑ת <WH3772> of them and thou shalt not cut them down כִּ֤י <WH3588> When הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> [is] man's עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> (for the tree הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> of the field לָבֹ֥א <WH935> [life]) to employ מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> accept בַּמָּצֽוֹר׃ <WH4692> should be besieged

רַ֞ק <WH7535> but עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> Only the trees אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תֵּדַ֗ע <WH3045> which thou knowest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> not עֵ֤ץ <WH6086> that they [be] not trees מַאֲכָל֙ <WH3978> for meat ה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תַשְׁחִ֖ית <WH7843> thou shalt destroy וְכָרָ֑תָּ <WH3772> and cut them down וּבָנִ֣יתָ <WH1129> and thou shalt build מָצ֗וֹר <WH4692> bulwarks עַל־ <WH5921> against הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> against the city אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הִ֨וא <WH1931> that עֹשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> that maketh עִמְּךָ֛ <WH5973> with מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> war עַ֥ד <WH5704> until רִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3381> with thee until it be subdued פ
